name.baseName: Steam/hot water/other ; Gasoline ; Chamber furnace ; All sizes; NESPS2
蒸汽/热水/其它 ; 汽油 ; 室燃炉 ; 所有规模 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution sulfur dioxideisS12 Others (sodium alkali method)，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management70

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution sulfur dioxideisS12 Others (sodium alkali method)，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management70
technology.technologicalApplicability: 所述工业过程涉及使用蒸汽、热水或其他形式汽油燃烧的各种规模的燃烧室炉。该过程包括多种末端污染管理技术。对于二氧化硫，使用石灰石/石膏法、双碱法、氧化镁法、氨法、旋转喷雾干燥法、循环流化床法和钠碱法等方法，效率为70%。对于烟尘，使用文丘里洗涤器、离心水膜、喷雾塔/水冲击浴和布袋过滤器等技术，效率高达99.6%。对于氮氧化物，使用选择性催化还原（SCR）技术，效率为70%。这一过程通常应用于需要能量生成的工业以及管理废气和烟气排放的行业。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,四级代码4430文件，在完整版文件中第5449页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Flue dustisBag filter，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management99.6
污染物指标烟尘的末端治理技术是袋式除尘，其效率为99.6，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为K=除尘设施年运行小时数/锅炉年运行小时数。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为烟尘，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为烟尘
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Flue dustisCentrifugal water film，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management87
污染物指标烟尘的末端治理技术是离心水膜，其效率为87，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为K=除尘设施年运行小时数/锅炉年运行小时数。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为烟尘，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为烟尘

Pollutant indicator sulfur dioxide end-of-pipe treatment technology is /, its efficiency is 0. The original document describes the pollutant category as exhaust gas, pollutant indicator sulfur dioxide, here to match it to the LCAflow library to match the most compatible flow, pollutant indicator note for sulfur dioxide, production coefficient note for the production coefficient of sulfur dioxide in the production coefficient of sulfur dioxide in the table in the form of the sulfur content (S%) expressed, where the sulfur content (S%) is expressed. The form of sulfur content (S%), where sulfur content (S%) refers to the fuel received base sulfur content, expressed in the form of mass percent. For example, if the sulfur content (S%) of the fuel is 0.1%, then S=0.1. The production coefficient described in the original text is 19 S. Please modify the corresponding emission level after calculating by yourself according to the remarks.

污染物指标二氧化硫的末端治理技术是/，其效率为0。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为二氧化硫，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为二氧化硫，产污系数备注为产污系数表中二氧化硫的产污系数是以含硫量（S％）的形式表示的，其中含硫量（S％）是指燃油收到基硫分含量，以质量百分数的形式表示。例如燃料中含硫量（S％）为0.1％，则S=0.1。原文描述的产污系数为 19S。请根据备注自行核算后修改对应的排放量。

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution sulfur dioxideisAmmonia method，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management70.The original article describes the pollution production coefficients as 19S。Please revise the corresponding emissions after accounting for them according to the notes.。.The original article describes the pollution production coefficients as 19S. Please revise the corresponding emissions after accounting for them according to the notes.
